The venerable Hubble Space Telescope is running out of gyroscopes, and when none are left… [+5070 chars]

articles.title: Windows 11 AI-Powered ‘Recall’ Feature Sparks Security Concerns, Researcher Reveals Data Exfiltration Risks - Wccftech

articles.content: Earlier, we posted about Microsoft's New Recall feature powered by AI for Windows 11 and running on the Copilot+PCs, which takes continuous screenshots of your activities. Security concerns were expr… [+2280 chars]
